9 The former commander of the Whiteman Air Force Base in Missouri claims he was completely unaware of a neighboring CCP owned trailer park (that shares a fence with the base). When are we going to stop playing games? The M.I.C. spies on us constantly all the time. THEY ARE IN ON THIS.
